explains: adj. 区别对待的，歧视的，不公平的
wordGroup: discriminatory analysis 判别分析；鉴别分析

sentences.en: These reforms will abolish racially discriminatory laws.
sentences.cn: 这些改革将废除种族歧视法律。

sentences.en: The dual system is rigid and discriminatory.
sentences.cn: 双轨制僵化，带有歧视性。

sentences.en: Discriminatory laws prevent the disabled from mixing with others.
sentences.cn: 歧视性法律禁止残疾人与其他人交往。
